title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.33 - Information in daily program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.33 - Information in daily program

State Regulations

Each racing association or corporation shall publish
an official racing program that shall denote the use of furosemide for the
programmed race and at least the six most recent purse races in the following
manner: (a) (L) horses running on furosemide; (b) (L1) horses running the first time on
furosemide. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
